Package com.ttc.fitPT.ptSchedule.controller

Class AuthController

java.lang.Object
com.ttc.fitPT.ptSchedule.controller.AuthController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/api/auth") public class AuthController extends Object
AuthController manages user authentication, including login, logout, and role redirection.

  • Method Details

    • handleLogin

      @PostMapping("/login") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> handleLogin(@RequestBody Map<String,String> loginData, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Handles POST requests for user login.
      Parameters:
      loginData - a map containing "username" and "password" fields.
      session - the HTTP session for storing user-specific attributes.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the redirect URL for role-based navigation or an error message.

    • loginPage

      @GetMapping("/login") public String loginPage(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Serves the login page.
      Parameters:
      model - a model object for passing attributes to the view.
      Returns:
      the name of the login page view.

    • welcomePage

      @GetMapping("/welcome") public String welcomePage()
      Serves the welcome page.
      Returns:
      the name of the welcome page view.

    • logout

      @GetMapping("/logout") public String logout(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Logs out the current user by invalidating their session and redirects to the index page.
      Parameters:
      session - the HTTP session to be invalidated.
      Returns:
      a redirect string to the index page.
